sentences.sContent: How do you usually spend your leisure time?
sentences.sContent_eng: How do you usually spend your leisure time?
sentences.sCn: 你通常是怎样度过你的空闲时间？

sentences.sContent: For the greatest part of what we say and do being unnecessary, if a man takes this away, he will have more leisure and less uneasiness.
sentences.sContent_eng: For the greatest part of what we say and do being unnecessary, if a man takes this away, he will have more leisure and less uneasiness.
sentences.sCn: 因为我们所说和所做的绝大部分事情都是不必要的，一个人如果取消它们，他将有更多的闲暇和较少的不适。

phrases.pCn: 休闲中心；体育活动中心

trans.tranCn: 空闲；悠闲，安逸；空闲时间
trans.tranOther: time when you are not working or studying and can relax and do things you enjoy
